title: SOLD T206 x130 HOFs... Beantown beaters

posts.post_title: SOLD T206 x130 HOFs... Beantown beaters
posts.post_content:
These mainly Piedmonts show major flaws, some are Fair, none are Good, all show nice color. Tried to remove those with paperloss if any others found, they will be replaced with one better. No rarities here so offer accordingly. Authenticity only guaranteed. 

I may not be able to respond to all emails. Plz send a reasonable offer to; [url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

Includes all that is in image. Sale will be determined when I say it is. Feel free to contact me directly! Gracie, Steve
